title: Ashe and Varus
body:
#LCS
Ashe and Varus game 1
Ashe and Varus game 2
Ashe and Varus game 3
Ashe and Varus game 4
Ashe and Varus game 5 6 7 8 9 
Fucking kill me

replies.body: when utility is utility.. and you forgot the occasional ezreal : ^)

That's where we come to a disagreement :/ cait is a result of the solo q meta. With adc's getting one shot by tanks by playing cait in solo q the extra range allows people to be safer. Also after the lethality buffs jhin and mf dumpster cait. Because once they get a dirk then they do so much more damage to cait. But if you really dislike cait that badly play ezreal into her hes safe and can poke her out :D

I was being sarcastic bro lol

I just had to point out the irony that Cait is not an issue in pro play, yet people keep asking nerfs for Cait which I find funny
ahh i see and i agree with you but remember pro play and solo q are two way different things. Example mao, naut in every damn pro game
yet i play either one of those in all my games

Anything that has less range than them can be instagibbed by any Top/Midlaner

Especially Ryze and Syndra

Also, AoE global range stun and root + AoE delayed root
Hold up, Varus is played in most games of the LCS? That's news to me ~~I'm a Varus main and I've never seen him used except when I did~~

This is what happens when you have absurd junglers and mids who can reliably blow up anything short of a dedicated tank at any point in the game without ever falling off. People resort to safe picks who can do things other than pure damage from long ranges. 

Maybe if Lee Sin/Kha'zix/Rengar/Cass/Ryze/Corki wern't all so bullshit you'd actually see some other ADCs on occasion, because teams might actually value damage from the ADC role.
